community.leaf.textchain.adventure.Chain

  • Uses of Chain in community.leaf.textchain.adventure

    Classes in community.leaf.textchain.adventure with type parameters of type Chain
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Chain<C extends Chain<C>>
    Abstract text chain.
    interface 
    ChainConstructor<C extends Chain<C>>
    Standard chain constructor: takes a WrappedTextComponentBuilder and creates a new chain instance.
    interface 
    ChainSource<C extends Chain<C>>
    Generates standard chain constructors.
    Subclasses of Chain in community.leaf.textchain.adventure
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    LegacyTextChain
    A text chain that will automatically process legacy ampersand-style color codes in text (like "&3&o").
    class 
    TextChain
    The de facto standard chain, and also a factory: all chains ultimately start here.

    TextChain.reset​(ChainConstructor<C> constructor)
    Constructs a new chain by supplying the constructor with a new, explicitly-unformatted text component builder (thus "resetting" its style).
    static <C extends Chain<C>>
    C
    TextChain.reset​(ChainConstructor<C> constructor, @NullOr TextColor color)
    Constructs a new chain by supplying the constructor with a new, explicitly-unformatted text component builder (thus "resetting" its style) with the specified color applied.
    static <C extends Chain<C>>
    C
    TextChain.reset​(ChainSource<C> source)
    Constructs a new chain by supplying the source's constructor with a new, explicitly-unformatted text component builder (thus "resetting" its style).

    C
    TextChain.reset​(ChainSource<C> source, @NullOr TextColor color)
    Constructs a new chain by supplying the source's constructor with a new, explicitly-unformatted text component builder (thus "resetting" its style) with the specified color applied.

    TextChain.wrap​(C chain)
